attributes.action: retailers not to sell certain types of products for more than their RRP
attributes.additional_details: introduce legislation requiring retailers not to sell certain types of products for more than their Recommended Retail Price
attributes.background: introduce legislation requiring retailers not to sell certain types of products for more than their Recommended Retail Price

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to restrict retailers from selling certain products for more than their recommended retail price, but it's not clear what products you want the Government to do this for.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to require retailers to sell certain products for no more than their recommended retail price.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to restrict people stockpiling and reselling items at inflated prices, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070
